rlDevPowerSaveModeCfg_t Struct Reference

Device power save mode configuration structure. More...

#include <control/mmwavelink/include/rl_device.h>

Data Fields

rlUInt8_t powerSaveCmd
 Power save commands are defined as below
Mode Definition
0 RESERVED
1 ENTER_POWERSAVE_MODE, device enters into power down state
from normal active state.
2 EXIT_POWERSAVE_MODE, device exits from power down state
to normal active state.
Others RESERVED
.
 
rlUInt8_t triggerMode
 Trigger mode
Mode Definition
0 API triggered
Power save entry/exit through this API
Others RESERVED
.
 
rlUInt16_t reserved0
 Reserved for future use.
 
rlUInt32_t reserved1 [4U]
 Reserved for future use.
 

Detailed Description

Device power save mode configuration structure.
